news_header: Outokumpu's deep hole reveals compounds linked to poor indoor air, aiding scientific understanding of environmental conditions.
news_original_title: Venäläiset porasivat 20 vuotta sitten Pohjois-Karjalaan syvän reiän, jonka hajut ihmetyttävät nyt tutkijoita
news_text: Outokumpu's deep hole, over 20 years old, has revealed volatile organic compounds related to poor indoor air, providing insights into ancient environments and potential extraterrestrial life.
